name: Tredo_Dopra
content:
Tredo Dopra was the chief trader aboard the Ithorian Herdship Veldt during the Galactic Civil War fought between the Rebel Alliance and Galactic Empire. The Veldt traveled from the uncharted reaches of the Outer Rim Territories to the Core Worlds, trading with other beings throughout its travels. Dopra's products aboard the Veldt included shimmersilk from the planet Ryloth's city of Kala'uun, flatsculps from Oordo III, and corusca stone jewelry from the planet Bimmisaari.
Tredo Dopra considered the travels the greatest joy of the trading profession, seeing exotic locations that beggared the imagination. Gathering goods from the far corners of the universe in order to pass them onto others, Dopra advertised showing beings what the galaxy would have to offer. A brown-skinned Ithorian with black eyes, Dopra wore a red garment over a brown one, with both garments exposing the chest area and ending at the thigh. A belt with pouches was worn over the undergarment across the waist.
Tredo Dopra was mentioned in 1997's Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition, a supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
